short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enjoy a customized web search experience from your browser search bar with Search Anything.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Update your browser search provider to searchanything.co powered by Yahoo!® search results.

Permissions:

1. Read and change your data on this product: We require this to improve user experience. By properly attributing user data with the source of origin, we ensure the product is made available to the correct user. This also helps us to identify spam and any abuse of our APIs and/or services. We require this permission in order to modify data on our domains only, and do not read or change data from any other domain a user may visit.

2. Change your browsing setting to searchanything.co: This permits the product to configure the omnibox with this product and offer the user an alternate web browsing experience.

We value your feedback and suggestions. Please share your input with us and help us further improve the product usage experience. You can uninstall this extension at your convenience.

Chrome is a trademark of Google LLC. Use of it here does not imply any affiliation with or endorsement by Google LLC.

Yahoo is a registered trademark of Apollo Global Management, Inc.

Upon clicking the button above, you confirm that you have read & agree to the Terms of Service & Privacy Policy and consent to install this Chrome™ extension.

Privacy Policy: https://searchanything.co/legal/privacypolicy.html
Terms of Services: https://searchanything.co/lega/termsofservice.html
